item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, October 30, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Chain-of-Thought Can Hurt Performance on Tasks Where Thinking Makes Humans Worse (79 points | 17 comments)
2. AI Flame Graphs (126 points | 50 comments)
3. Steam games will need to disclose kernel-level anti-cheat on store pages (264 points | 129 comments)
4. Google's TOS doesn't eliminate a user's Fourth Amendment rights, judge rules [pdf] (223 points | 154 comments)
5. Crafting Painterly Shaders (58 points | discuss)
6. Rubocop-obsession: RuboCop extension focused on higher-level concepts (34 points | 13 comments)
7. An Italian 'fruit detective' who investigates centuries-old paintings (25 points | 1 comment)
8. SimpleQA (66 points | 19 comments)
9. Show HN: AI OmniGen – AI Image Generator with Consistent Visuals (59 points | 12 comments)
10. OpenZFS deduplication is good now and you shouldn't use it (4 points | discuss)
11. Pushing the frontiers of audio generation (143 points | 58 comments)
12. DeepSeek v2.5 – open-source LLM comparable to GPT-4, but 95% less expensive (83 points | 16 comments)
13. M4 MacBook Pro (596 points | 771 comments)
14. Google CEO says more than a quarter of the company's new code is created by AI (171 points | 252 comments)
15. Show HN: LlamaPReview – AI GitHub PR reviewer that learns your codebase (66 points | 26 comments)
16. Infisical (YC W23) is hiring full stack engineers (remote or in SF) ( | hide)
17. Classic 3D videogame shadow techniques (292 points | 62 comments)
18. Representing web applications as knowledge graphs (50 points | 4 comments)
19. Launch HN: FlyCode (YC S22) – Stop losing revenue due to failed payments (60 points | 49 comments)
20. Norlha, the Luxury Yak Wool Brand Made by Nomads on the Tibetan Plateau (5 points | discuss)
21. Show HN: Routing24 – Free route optimization in the browser (20 points | 9 comments)
22. CFPB finalizes personal financial data rights rule (111 points | 39 comments)
23. Morsing of the Dead [video] (8 points | 1 comment)
24. The realities of building an IPv6-only city – APNIC (4 points | discuss)
25. Is Patrick Mackenzie's salary negotiation guide relevant in today's market? (10 points | 6 comments)
26. Australia/Lord_Howe is the weirdest timezone (902 points | 369 comments)
27. Fruits (2020) (117 points | 22 comments)
28. Sketchy financials send Supermicro auditors running for the hills (58 points | 11 comments)
29. NASA reconnected with Voyager 1 after a brief pause (186 points | 115 comments)
30. ThunderKittens: Simple, fast, and adorable AI kernels (62 points | 7 comments)
